seniority_level.evidence: Title mentions 'Senior' in 'Senior, hands-on data modeler' and requires 10 years of experience in data management with 5+ years in database design

job_family.evidence: Core focus on data modeling, ETL, and data warehouse implementation aligns with data engineering responsibilities

sub_specialty.evidence: Explicit mention of 'enterprise data warehouse', 'Kimball Dimensional Data Modeling Framework', and 'Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW)'

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions mentoring team members, educating on best practices, and technical leadership of a data warehouse team without explicit people management duties

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicit mention of 'Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW)' and 'OCI environment' in both title and responsibilities

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Oracle

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL activities and Kimball dimensional modeling are typically batch-oriented; no explicit streaming tools or paradigms mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: Oracle tools and ETL mentioned, but no specific orchestrator like Airflow, Step Functions, or Data Factory explicitly stated

storage_layer.evidence: Explicit mention of 'enterprise data warehouse', 'relational data modeling', 'dimensional data modeling', and 'Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW)'

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid work required with 'Must live within 60 miles maximum from location' and 'Local to Sac, CA preferred'

timezone_focus.evidence: No explicit timezone focus mentioned beyond geographic proximity to Sacramento, CA

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model requires local residency within 60 miles, implying no relocation needed

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT or student visa eligibility; geographic proximity requirement suggests work authorization is needed upfront

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit citizenship or work authorization requirements stated beyond geographic proximity

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Title explicitly mentions '_W2_' indicating W2 employment type

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'Mentors and educates team members on best practices and industry standards'

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility, lateral moves, or team changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role emphasizes hands-on technical leadership and mentoring without explicit people management, suggesting IC track; no mention of management or other tracks

requirement_strictness.evidence: Multiple 'Mandatory' and 'Minimum years of experience' requirements with strict qualifiers

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities focusing on data modeling, data warehouse implementation, and related tasks

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requires 10 years of experience for a role that appears to be senior data modeling-focused, which may be inflated given typical seniority expectations
